attribution: Used with permission from UCLES, A Physics, November 1986, Paper 2, Question 2.
title: The Record Player

children.value:
A record is played at 
$\quantity{45}{rpm}$
, and then slowed down to 
$\quantity{33\frac{1}{3}}{rpm}$
.

answer.value:
The ratio of the magnitude of the centripetal accelerations of a point on the rim of the record before and after the change is valuedef
1.82

children.value: Find the ratio of the magnitude of the centripetal accelerations of a point on the rim of the record before and after the change. Write your answer to two decimal places.
